website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for milk chocolate truffles with an ample quantity and reasonable price, this collection by Lindt is a nice treat and value.
pros: Individually-wrapped milk chocolate truffles with silky, smooth texture and soft, creamy consistency
Made by a popular chocolate manufacturer
You get a lot for the price – 60 pieces per box
cons: A few customers complain about truffles appearing old or stale, with a white film and oily shell
Some truffles were melted upon delivery
but some shipments arrived with ice packs

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually post reviews and this one is more for Amazon than the product, because if you're buying it, you already know how good it is. It's early spring and it's starting to get HOT. They shipped it in a box fully encapsulating the Lindt with foam and Polar Tech refrigerant packs to keep it from melting! I am truly touched by the attention to detail. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with ice packs!
customer_reviews.text: I love Lindor truffles, and I just ordered them in June in Florida, Amazon shipped them with ice packs! They were cool on arrival, thank you Amazon, I am thoroughly pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It has been cool the last few days in Florida
customer_reviews.text: I read the melting issue from other reviewers but took the risk to order as a Xmas gift for my son - he loves this stuff. How could they box perhaps already melted pieces? It has been cool the last few days in Florida, cannot be because of the hot weather. Photo shows close-up of melted pieces. Am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: These do not come in the box shown!!!
customer_reviews.text: These did NOT come in the Lindor company box like it shows in the listing! It was just loose truffles in a random box! Who knows where they came from or if they were tampered with? I retuned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: My Mistake
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. White chocolate exterior and creamy liquid center, what's not to like? Got them at an excellent price on a lightning deal. They arrived promptly in good condition. Ate one to insure they were the real thing. Excellent. Hid them from wife. Not well enough. Wife found them. I salvaged the last one in the box. Am now looking for a better hiding place.
customer_reviews.author: tanq2u

customer_reviews.title: Don'tr buy to have shipped!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love these chocolates EXCEPT DO NOT BUY these to be shipped. Either these were very old to begin with or during shipping the order got too hot as the insides are all melded into the outside. There is no creamy inside at all in any I have opened so far. I am not returning these since I've been going thru them but for one I eat I have to throw one away. Very bad purchase. Probably my fault for buying chocolate on-line.
customer_reviews.author: SUE E. HOLLEY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent candy. But don’t order in the summer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent candy. But don’t order in the summer. Stupid mail carrier left it on my front porch in Texas in the summer heat, entire box melted into a big blob. Not Amazon’s fault ! But I will only order in the winter from now on. Best candy out there for dark chocolate lovers who don’t want to spend a fortune on the highest end chocolate. Yummy !
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Lindt Truffles
customer_reviews.text: Multiple puchaces made of these and similar Lindt Truffles. Very nice taste, smooth and soft. I've never had the melting problem in shipping some have mentioned. I don't order during periods of hot weather. The price of these items often varies, sometimes getting fairly high so watch for the fluctuations. A word of caution, keep these out of reach and hide when company comes. They will disappear rapidly. These can be refrigerated or even frozen without a loss of quality or taste. My peronal preference is for dark chocolates when available. That is not meant to take away from these exceptional milk chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Creamy vanilla truffles. Delectable.
customer_reviews.text: These little balls are pure vanilla happiness. They are made with white chocolate, which to me means sweet vanilla candy with a chocolate-like texture. They are soft and truffle-y within, having a flavor slightly reminiscent of cheesecake. The shell is creamy and a bit firmer. Crunchy flecks of chocolate are strewn throughout. The trademark quality of Lindt chocolate is evident in these candies, with cream and vanilla flavors to die for.
customer_reviews.author: Honey🍯Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Melted centers?
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was fine and they arrived during a cool spell which was a concern, the temperature in the low 70's. The chocolate was fresh but the centers were liquid, I expected a truffle with more of a semi-solid whipped to cream type filling as that is what I've had in other truffles. I was very disappointed as they didn't have that "melt in your mouth" flavor. I don't know if this is normal or something that happened while in transit, but I won't buy these again, as there are many other better truffles. I've a constant buyer of Lindt dark chocolate bars (love the chili) but I will pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: DanceVice

customer_reviews.title: They were all flat and melted...useless.
customer_reviews.text: The replacement package was delivered and pulled it off the porch less than 5 minutes after delivery. Once again, the cold packs inside were warm and all the chocolates were all so melted they are flat. I am very disappointed. I have ordered these before and all was fine. I want a full refund creditied to my bank account. I can' serve these at parties. Whoever ships these needs to understand they MUST stay cold or they melt. This was the second order, but I want a full refund on the first order that had the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Megason

customer_reviews.title: Need to know- don’t gift before opening-really
customer_reviews.text: This product on a 4th purchase bought for a gift arrived melted in horrid condition! How embarrassing for me! Will not give as a gift unopened! Was not notified until today by people who received it. It’s a shame since it was such a great gift before~ 😔
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & adorable for spider cookies
customer_reviews.text: I make spider Halloween cookies every year & they get rave reviews. These truffles melt in your mouth & are heavenly!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Totally melted onto box, a hot mess
customer_reviews.text: Although there were cold packs in the box, it came totally melted and inedible
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: all melted
customer_reviews.text: These are just the best truffles ever but when they arrive all melted, there is no way one can enjoy the true flavors for the reason I ordered them. I didn't want to return them because they are such a mess. I could take a picture if needed but I put them in the refrigerator to help save some of them but most of the truffle inside is melted to nothing. I want to order them again but I guess it will have to wait for cooler weather. I certainly did not get my monies worth from these. Most of them were melted to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Carty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These came yesterday...two days EARLY! I wasn’t expecting them yet, but they were added into another Prime order! They came fresh and no melting. I will say, I was home so they didn’t sit on the porch, which could have lead to melting (SC in the spring). This was added to another Prime order and not packed in a cooler (I have seen some others that come with freezer packs). I attached pictures!
customer_reviews.author: User Reviews

customer_reviews.title: black box and chocolate smelled like laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: It came in a no-name packaging black bag without expiration date and no-name black gift box instead of the original Lindt packaging. The package must have been kept with some kind of detergent, because the packaging, black box and chocolate smelled like laundry detergent. Some tasted like fragrance flavor. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product atleast 3 times from amazon and multiple times from local stores, mostly as a treat / gift for some happy occasion. I have felt that whenever I get it from amazon, although it comes in the ice packs, but somewhere before its placed in the ice-packs there is a period of time when its hot enough to melt the choco. 2 out of 3 times i received it molten and then refrozen in weird shapes. BUT - I LOVE the flavor. and so do everyone else, and thus I keep on buying! This is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DoLittle

customer_reviews.title: Great go to Birthday gift for dark chocolate lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Great go to birthday gift for dark chocolate lovers. Nothing more amazing then an extra large Champaign glass filled with Lindor dark chocolate. They are a hit at work too. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Received totally melted no help to return or exchange
customer_reviews.text: This product got to my house completely melted and unusable. When I tried to notify for return of product because of this I got a message that product could not be returned or exchanged but no way to contact for defective product other than sitting on hold talking to people for the longest time. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KnestautJ

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTALICUOUS !!!  ;D
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE SO AMAZINGLY GOOD!!!!! I just ordered a Box of these a couple days ago for $13 on a "Lightening Deal". They Are So "Melt-in-Your-Mouth" DELICIOUS! I WISH I COULD HAVE ORDERED 10 BOXES!! ☆ At the Lightening Deal Price!! ☆ I Have Tried ALL of the Other Flavors of The LINDT Chocolate Balls... And Now This Kind, ☆ STRACCIATELLA ☆, Is My ABSOLUTE FAVORITE!!! I am Certain, that I will Buy More in the Future!! Even at their Regular Price of $20, per Box of 60, each Candy only costs a Bit under $0.33... A Splurge for Me on My Budget, But Too DELICIOUS To Resist!!!! Yummmmm... Nummmmm... (;P)°°°°°°°°°°
customer_reviews.author: Daermon Na'shezbaernon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE CHOCOLATE —— and can’t get a refund since it’s grocery product—
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use this as part of a wine and chocolate bar But when received,was in a cooler box with ice packs, but the ice bags we’re completely melted and actually hot.the entire box of chocolate was melted chocolate everywhere on inside of box. Was of no use to me like this so I had to throw it out..very dissatisfied!!!!! And it wasn’t even hot that day,nor did it sit on my step,I brought it in when he delivered ——very dissatisfied—-
customer_reviews.author: CMELWWOOD

customer_reviews.title: You just can't beat Lindt for good chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I used to live right near a Lindt outet store and let me tell you, they knew me by my first name there. Interestingly though, these truffles were actually cheaper on Amazon than on the Lindt site (28 cents each as opposed to 30 cents on the Lindt site) and I got free Prime shipping. But more importantly, these were delivered in a styro cool packed in ice. Can you believe that? They arrived in perfect condition, fresh as the day they were made. I'm not crazy about the soft (liquid) center truffles, but they're still great. Packed in ice and in a free cooler, can you believe that?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! My guys got these for me for Valentine's, and I have been just tickled pink every since!! I have them next to my bed, and I savor 1 each night while watching my shows. I absolutely score these! If you're considering trying these - absolutely grab them they are fantastic!! Unlike some "sea salted" candies you will crunch down on a few little pieces of salt suspended in the chocolate center. These can be near impossible to find in the store, I will be buying myself another box when these run out! Hope my review was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: TheBowdensTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not even a vanilla or white chocolate fan and these are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I really did not expect to like these at all, but loved them. My kids are all about white chocolate but are a fan of the plain milk chocolate truffles by this company so I figured these would make a sweet v-day gift for my three girls. They loved them. Just as creamy as the other varieties by the same company, but the flavor is great too. Vanilla with little chocolate bits that help balance the sweetness from the vanilla. I would definitely order again for myself and my girls. The bulk price is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don't order when its really hot outside
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they ship the candy in an ice chest with a freezer pack. I was hoping the heat would not get to the candy, but whom am I kidding. Louisiana in August has beaten many a worthy opponent. The candy arrived molten. No one's fault. After sitting in the AC overnight, they are edible, just still liquid on the inside. Good flavor, just a different texture. Still very enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product.
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered before and was pleased. This time I feel cheated and ripped off. Ordered dark chocolate but received milk chocolate with caramel mixed in. There was a light discoloration on the surface. The truffles were not smooth on the outside like they have been in the past. Will not order again as it costs too much for inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: I heard more comments on how good they were and watched people sneak back for seconds ...
customer_reviews.text: These are just delicious! I used them on a dessert table that was a pink and white themed decorative table. They are the creamy white that is pictured on the box which was darker than I really needed, but I unwrapped them and put each one in individual truffle papers that were white. Even though they didn't match exactly, they were the hit of the table. I heard more comments on how good they were and watched people sneak back for seconds thirds. There is no replacement for the taste and quality of this item!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good when on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Having numerous family members invited for Christmas, one can be on a Christmas chocolate budget, but not for very long because ...tatadam: Here are the Chocoladefabriken Lindt & Sprüngli AG commonly called Lindt with their 60 lindor box at a very very reasonable price. Delivered promptly, these chocolate are delicious, but do not order them if the weather is too warm or they will be melty....You just want them to be melty on your tongue, not in their individual packaging! I picked up the Dark Chocolate Truffles. I love them. Lindor it is like a chocolate fondant: hard externally and so soft and runny inside. Highly recommended. Not sure they will last until Christmas now...
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order these because of the reviews. I finally decided to give it a try. I was being a little brave since the temperate is starting to raise. Fortunately they were shipped quickly and the temperature dropped into the 60's (in May!). The truffles arrived in perfect condition and I was able to resist for an hour before I broke into them. I got the milk chocolate, but I love all the flavors. I probably won't be reordering until the fall when the temperature drops again. I'd hate to think of these little gems riding around in the back of a hot delivery truck! Oh! Time for another truffle!
customer_reviews.author: SleepsWithDogs

customer_reviews.title: One of my Favs
customer_reviews.text: If only I didn't get fat from eating all these snacks, I'd eat them all day. At about 73 calories a ball, it doesn't seem that bad at all, but it's so easy for me to throw the whole bag in my mouth in one sitting. Mine arrived in a cooling pack, tasted super fresh and gained me some weight. Definitely not for the lack of self-control people. This melt in your mouth chocolate just oozes with goodness. Flavor 5/5 ***** Freshness 5/5 ***** My Recommendation 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Intense Small Chocolates.
customer_reviews.text: We love these chocolates, which usually arrive in perfect condition. They are small. Firm. Intenze li y chocolate and not too sweet. Heads up, however. For the first time ever our last two boxes arrived in poor condition. They had clearly partially melted and then regained their normal firmness in distorted shapes. The wrappings and inside of their boxes were disfigured by chocolate smears. We reported them and hope no one else encounters this, which is an unusual happening in cold November.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Vogt-O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Melted biz if grainy goo. Right into the trash
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the reviews before ordering, but I live the Lundor truffle and had no idea that I was going to be taking delivery of a melted box of grainy goo that went right from the opening table to the garbage. You would think they would have taken some measures to prevent this. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Deantonio

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chocolate in a BIG box!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous taste, exceptional quality products, great presentation. The box it comes in is beautiful. The price per each piece is a great bargain! The complaints about melted product is not fair when you order in summer. 70 degrees is probably the correct temperature for these. I have my box in the refrigerator and take out the number I am planning on eating 5 or 10 minutes before I eat one. If the price stays the same this is a real bargain!
customer_reviews.author: L. Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Lovely treat and perfect gift... just make sure to order when it is cold outside!
customer_reviews.text: My mother is this tiny little thing and somehow she is able to eat Lindt truffles several times a day and never gains a pound (I am so jealous) so I was delighted when I found I could order entire boxes as special gifts for her. I got a lightening deal on the last one and she was overjoyed at getting a box of 60 for no reason at all, aside from being an amazing mother. In the past few years I've ordered several boxes and various flavors of the Lindt truffles and the only bad experience was when I stupidly ordered a box in June... what was I thinking? Heat is not a friend to these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Bre

customer_reviews.title: To Die For
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? They're so freaking delicious--I'm a pretty healthy eater until this babies show up. Then I turn into a ravenous ten-year-old who found the Halloween candy before mom and dad got home. If they ever send assassins after me, all they're gonna have to do is leave a poisoned box of this on my doorstep and I'll be dead within the hour...unless poison works faster than that. I don't know. All I know is that all that talk of "tummy aches" from eating too much chocolate is BS and I think I just put on four pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Corso

customer_reviews.title: So good that you can’t eat just one!
customer_reviews.text: Words alone cannot describe these Lindt Lindor Milk Chocolate Truffles. You must taste it for yourself. If you’re a texture person you'll love it. Here’s how to eat one for your 1st time. Pop one into your mouth. Don’t chew it. You must let it melt into your mouth. They have a milk chocolate inner & outer. As it melts, the Inside flows into your mouth. It is a voluptuous, soft, velvety, thick pudding-like milk chocolate center that flows into your mouth. It is a very sensual & enjoyable experience especially if you’re a texture person. Delish times 100....!.
customer_reviews.author: Lane & Fran Lobaugh

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Eco-friendly packaging
customer_reviews.text: These chocolates are super delish for dark chocolate lovers like me. The center ganash is liquid if you leave them at room temp. and is solid if you put in the frig. I was SO impressed when they came in a box with padding that had been made by using recycled plastic bottles and can be recycled again by putting it in my home recycling! Wow, the world is beginning to care...a lot. It did come with a cold gel pack (which I froze to reuse) which I suppose was needed to make sure the chocolates didn't melt on the way. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Giannini

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth Swiss chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Well, the Swiss are known for chocolate and these are from one of the most famous Swiss brands. If you want to taste the best chocolate you have to get handmade praline. So short of travelling to Switzerland these truffles are the next best alternative. They have a 'hard' shell with a smooth center. There are many options from the rather sweet white chocolate to dark chocolate. I keep them in the fridge so they keep their freshness. When I want to eat one I take it out from the fridge and let it get to room temperature for about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: book guru

customer_reviews.title: Yummy but Melted
customer_reviews.text: We get these all the time, in all sizes, but this past order was melted. There was chocolate melted in to the wrapper which I could see you I unwrapped it so I knew immediately there was a problem. Then when I opened and bit in to it half the chocolate was already gone. I called to ask if I could send them back and get a refund and they said they would issue a refund and to keep them. Well, months later and no refund was ever issued so i will contact them again. I’m not happy but every other time I’ve ordered them they’ve been nothing but perfect and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable White Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: If I had known how good these were, I would have purchased at least a dozen cases of 60 count at that time priced at the unbelievably low cost of $12.42 one and a half months ago. Now the cost has almost doubled. These are by far the best chocolate of any kind you can put in your mouth. Just put one in your mouth and savor the favor for a couple of minutes and then when you get down to the center core...are you in for a treat. The center core is even better than the outer ball if you can believe that! It's just a shame they don't last longer than they do.
customer_reviews.author: 3D Tech

customer_reviews.title: Yummy. If you don't buy them, that just leaves more for me...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several times because for the price, these are the most delicious chocolates ever. Can you imagine what G***a would charge for 60 truffles!! Every time mine have been fresh & perfect. Ok, the last ones received at Christmas were almost frozen but it didn't hurt the taste one bit. If you order, just keep in mind if you live in a hot climate and/or they are left outside, they are apt to melt. That's sort of what chocolate does. Mine haven't gotten too hot in the delivery trucks and as soon as UPS comes up my drive , I'm out there to grab them like a goose that somebody's thrown bread crumbs at. Delish!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: My order had obviously been left in a hot environment, as both packages, shipping in the same box, and all of the candy was almost totally melted. This also affected the taste, so even after putting them in the fridge to harden up, the flavor was gone. I would return both orders, but I just threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Melted Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, our chocolates were melted by the time they got to our door. We do live in Florida and they were ordered in November for Thanksgiving, but I was home when they arrived so it wasn’t because they sat too long on my door step. We salvaged what we could for our Thanksgiving and threw the rest out. They were all melted to some degree, some just more than others. None were round like they should be, but the ones we were able to eat tasted as usual...delicious. Guess chocolate is one of those things you need to buy at the brick and motor, not online.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love the Delectable Dark Lindt Truffle!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to get Lindt Dark Chocolates! They came in a luxurious box, much better than I expected. I was disappointed when I did not receive the package of chocolates and other things initially. Ten days later, to my happy surprise, the package was placed in front of my door. I could not figure out where the package came from. Anyhow, all is well that ends well. I cannot wait to indulge myself in Lindt dark chocolates while being stuck in a “bird’s nest” in the epicenter.
customer_reviews.author: Ann  X

customer_reviews.title: Best Dark Chocolate Truffles
customer_reviews.text: Lindt can do no wrong! I am a chocoholic, and Lindt is simply the best, to my way of thinking. My local pharmacy carries the small bags of Lindt and I tried the new Strawberry Cheesecake and Caramel Brownie in the flat bars last week. Hope to find those on Amazon soon! The first time I tried Lindt Lindor dark chocolate truffles, I had gone to see my computer guru, a very nice Chinese man who built my computer. It was the week before Chinese New Year and he handed me a box of 60! That was the beginning of my addiction to Lindt Lindor, and that addiction has not stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Nan

customer_reviews.title: ... a box different from what's shown when I ordered like the one above
customer_reviews.text: I received a box different from what's shown when I ordered like the one above. My family had been a Lindt Chocolate customer for years. This is the first time we ordered through Amazon. The product I just ordered definitely DID NOT TASTE LIKE A LINDT and not close to any caramel flavor. I have shared some pcs with my wife and daughter and they, too, noticed the unlikely taste of a LINDT product. We are not very happy with this order. I also ordered a box as a gift and was sent to a friend and I hope the white chocolate will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly but without an ice pack so I have to keep them in the refrigerator. They are pretty much all melted but once refrigerated are OK. They came in a big enough box that cold packs could have been used in this extremely hot Midwestern weather and the hot UPS truck. That being said, they are tasty. I wish they were less expensive. I have bought them before and only buy them once in a blue moon because of the high price. I still recommend a product and the
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela

customer_reviews.title: what's not to like about chocolate
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES Lindor Milk Chocolate Truffles. I decided to buy a larger box. The chocolates are individually wrapped, and come in a store-display type box. You might not think of giving it as a gift in that box, but putting the balls in a nice glass container, or small tulle fabric bags for favors would be fine. The quality of the chocolate was the same as it always is. These weren't stale or smashed; they were in good shape. I'll be buying more once the kiddo is finished with this box.
customer_reviews.author: tsu

customer_reviews.title: I usually give high ratings to this product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering these for quite awhile. This last box did not live up to standards I looked for a way to contact the supplier as this will not stop me from ordering this wonderful chocolate. This box .. the chocolate had a whitish tinge over it and the usually melt in your mouth insides just didn't do it.. I'd appreciate any help in contacting the dealer.. thanks so much I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh but edible!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chocolate lover and was excited to buy a box of these for a shower as thank you gift along with other assorted wrapped candies. However, upon opening one of them I discovered they are not fresh and have a slight white film covering them. Perhaps heat/cold affected some but even the taste was not fresh as expected. While disappointing, they are still edible and will last my chocolate cravings for a while. Would not recommend for freshness.
customer_reviews.author: CB SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Didn't ship with cold packs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The description says it ships cold but I recieved mine without any cold packs and about a third of the box was melted and disfigured. There was chocolate smeared all on the outside of the wrappers and the inside of the box. There was also a bloom on the truffles which could be from getting too hot or being old but I'm assuming it's both. A bit disappointed but at least the chocolate can be frozen and still eaten.
customer_reviews.author: s johnson

customer_reviews.title: No longer a liquid...they were just too warm!
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I apologize for that last review. When my candies arrived, they had apparently been sitting out in the hot Texas sun too long...and although the chocolate on the outside was not melted, the inside was completely liquid. After an overnight in my house, these lovely, delicious little morsels "hardened" up and are now, silky smooth on the inside, and no longer in liquid form I am enjoying them, much like this Time of National Lockdown...a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: Majesta

customer_reviews.title: So good they didn't last through thanksgiving weekend
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two boxes for thanksgiving because of the 60pc count and value per box when buying "bulk". Product arrived ahead of time and did not last through the holiday weekend because we just ate it all up. I thought to gift the other box but we were all pretty much into that one too before we knew it. I highly recommend this product to any chocolate lover.
customer_reviews.author: IKE

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Love London Milk Chocolate truffles. I usually buy them at my local stores. Buuut... can’t go shopping like I used to so I placed an order for them. I was disappointed. They were ok, but not as fresh as I usually get. If this is coming directly from the manufacturer, they should be ashamed. This is not the Lindor Truffles that I am used to. Not buying candy off of Amazon again. You don’t get what you paid for; fresh delicious chocolates.
customer_reviews.author: Gamz

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves them
customer_reviews.text: I try this brand before and my boyfriend loves chocolate so I send him a box and other stuff for valentine's days thus Amazon and I was a bit worry they would arrive melted since I saw some bad reviews but lucky they got there in good condition and he loves them alot also told me to send me pictures of the how the chocolate arrived as you can see Update/ my boyfriend bought me the white chocolate lindo and came in well store and and on time I lobe this chocolates so does him
customer_reviews.author: NaNa

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo nummy and fresh!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G. These truffles are absolutely to die for. Unfortunately, we ate them up so fast we're waiting awhile to buy some more! They were delivered in a small/medium sized, styrofoam cooler with ice packs and were super fresh and delicious. I put the awesome little cooler in the back area of my CR-V and I'm now using it to put frozen stuff I buy at the grocery store in now to stay cold until I get home. I highly recommend these truffles!!
customer_reviews.author: Mugsy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and fresh, and Superb shipping with extra padding and a cold pack
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was excellent. The product had been wrapped in extra thick padding and included two cold packs to help ensure that the chocolates didn’t melt - which they hadn’t. Too, none were broken. The chocolates themselves, well what can you say? It’s Lindt Lindor truffles! The Stracciatella is my favorite flavor and every time I have ordered them, each individually wrapped candy arrived unmelted, whole and, very importantly, FRESH!
customer_reviews.author: Visitor

customer_reviews.title: Not presentable to gift, all are damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, this is an expensive candy. They came in a bag not in the box as illustrated. They taste find but all of them are sunken in and damaged. It's the kind of candy you want to gift 1 or 2 to someone but they all look terrible. Buy them in the store and they always look great. This is really disappointing to me. If you buy them to eat yourself they're fine but I wouldn't suggest gifting them. BTW, I bought these in the fall so no one can blame the heat of delivery during summer months.
customer_reviews.author: CherryM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as if melted.  Huge mess!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 boxes for our Airbnb to go in our “snack tray”. One box was fine, the other arrived as if the chocolates melted. Every single wrapper has melted chocolate on it and they are all shaped odd as if they partially melted. Unusable. Unfortunately, I’m going to be choosing different truffles for the snack tray!
customer_reviews.author: Kym McQuiston

customer_reviews.title: Summer slump
customer_reviews.text: Ordinarily, this a 5-star product. Fast shipping and you get what you expect, official Lindt delicious chocolate. However, for anyone living in the summer months, you will NOT get what you expect. Even though they took measures to help keep fresh, by putting cold packs in the package, it arrived melted and lost all shape, and consistency. The taste and texture was changed, and I was disappointed. So, buyer beware. Oh, another thing is that I got it off my porch immediately upon delivery. At least at my house, it did not sit for long outside. I will not order again until temperatures go down.
customer_reviews.author: D. Groveman

customer_reviews.title: Yep - Get These!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, these are simply the best chocolate/caramel treats in the world...and I'm a picky chocolate connoisseur ;-) We will buy these on repeat, especially complimented by red wine!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped in icebox that was too large and poorly packed. The ice pack enclosed had broken open due to poor packing and rough handling and gooey gunk from it was all over the box which had become soggy. Chocolates inside appear not to be damaged but are not dark chocolate more like sweet milk chocolate. I have liked Lindt for over 60 years so am disappointed. Hope after refrigeration they will taste better.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and great fro sharing
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived in perfect condition, fresh and no staleness to the texture or flavor of the chocolate, and a great option for communal kitchens. The sea salt adds a subtle extra something to plain chocolate, but isn't strong to put off the flavor. I generally enjoy purchasing this brand of chocolate and would recommend it for parties, offices, or any shared spaces. The individual packages is good for hygiene and portion control.
customer_reviews.author: Kris NT

customer_reviews.title: Meltdown
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product in the past from the same seller and never had an issue. However, this last time the chocolates were melted. In the past, they were always shipped with ice, but this time it wasn't, so when I opened the box there was a big meltdown. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps not good ordering to deliver to Florida
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever had these chocolates then all you need to know is yum yum. We live in FL & on this occasion they must have sat in my porch for a while as were nearly liquid but we just put them in the fridge as our fault we weren't in, they were a bit misshapen & I could not have given them as a gift but they were for us so no problem. If you are a white choccy fan you won't be disappointed & I think they are a good price
customer_reviews.author: Dean Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great and Yummy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have always thought that Lindt products were more tasty and smooth than other brands. This did not disappoint me. Purchasing in bulk is cheaper than purchasing small packages, so I am thrilled that these chocolates (which are so smooth) will be in my kitchen for a while. The taste of Lindt products surpasses that of other Chocolatier and the chocolate seems creamier, tastier and more delightful to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Colette Jaccard

customer_reviews.title: Different Sizes But Not Spoiled Like Other Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was on sale for my toddler for Christmas stocking stuffers. Very cheap compared to in store price. The various sizes actually allowed me to stuff some into our advent calendar also so it ended up working overall. I just read some of the reviews and it’s a 70-30% chance you get good chocolates and while mine are various sized I did get good chocolates and am just happy they didn’t come spoiled or melted. Yes people chocolate definitely spoils, it doesn’t get the chance to in our house but I’d be so disappointed if I bought it spoiled so just happy I was a part of the 70%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Good & the Bad--3* rating reflects
customer_reviews.text: These taste amazing. 😋 However, they've doubled in price since I bought 2 boxes from Amazon just before Dec 2018. It's a shame too that 3rd party seller's feel the need to take advantage just because they're not available in some areas. They really are delicious, Just not for double the price. 😕
customer_reviews.author: itsjustme-mg

customer_reviews.title: These are the most delicious chocolates i have every tasted
customer_reviews.text: If you eat them chilled, they break like 3 different kind of flavors in your mouth Whether you chew them chilled or you just keep them in your mouth to melt it down My kids use the melt down technique and i use the chilled chewing technique to eat these YUMMMMMMY chocolates One of my daughters said, "These are the most delicious chocolates i have every tasted" and FYI my daughter has tasted Belgian chocolates, Nestle and i guess more than 50 different chocolates....
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Ahsan UX UI Designer

customer_reviews.title: I can go back to ordering chocolate in the summer
customer_reviews.text: My wife eats on of these everyday around 3pm. I married a chocoholic. I resisted buying chocolates from Amazon in the summer, but thought I'd give it a try once I read a few recent reviews that said that melting was not a continuing issue. They were right. Not sure if the manufacturer, dealer, or Amazon should take the credit for the packaging, but it was handled well. For this order, the box received was the original retail packaging. I'm not sure if that was the case on previous orders, but the product quality and taste has always been consistently great.
customer_reviews.author: Electron Lover

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This sounds a little crazy, but my dentist's front office staff loves dark chocolate so much!! Anyway, I did not know exactly what to give them for an Easter gift and I was looking on Amazon and I saw this box of Truffles and thought: Perfect! So, I ordered it and put them in a really cute basket and OMG! They went crazy!! They were so excited, I think they had eaten about 10 of them by the time I came back out from having my cavity filled (talk about irony!). I love Lindt LINDOR Truffles and this is a great way to give the gift of truffles to a large group without paying a large price!
customer_reviews.author: summersky51

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best chocolate available
customer_reviews.text: It’s impossible to go wrong with these candies...always so creamy, melt-in-your-mouth delicious. I’d say they rival the “truffles” some chocolate companies offer. They’re that good. And kudos to Amazon on shipping. Inside the cardboard box was a small styrofoam ice chest and inside that were the 2 boxes of chocolates I ordered — and a frozen gel pack to keep them cool. Since Lindor truffles melt very easily, I appreciated them taking those measures to make sure they didn’t melt while sitting in a hot delivery truck. They arrived perfectly intact.
customer_reviews.author: InDaKnow

customer_reviews.title: Hey...it’s LINDT...yeah😊
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, caramel is silky and not too firm. Chocolate-caramel lovers will love them. They come in a 60 piece box, so easy to transport to Christmas parties...and watchout... The box will be gone before long. Self control people🤤🤤
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the different flavors of Lindt truffles and was unaware of this one--I think I found a new favorite! The tiny chocolate pieces add some crunch which melted in your mouth--truly delicious with the white chocolate. The candy arrived expertly packed in a padded foam box with ice to prevent melting. I am very impressed in how the company protected this product for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, best taste, perfect condition, arrived quickly! Thank you Amazon/seller!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite chocolates. They melt in your mouth leaving a creamy milk chocolate caramel taste that is by far better than any candy bar or chocolates I’ve had and the price for the large quantity is unbeatable. This order shipped quickly and each chocolate is in tact and in perfect condition. The box arrived with a slight dent on the front but it did not affect the product inside at all. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee L

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Rich!!
customer_reviews.text: These chocolates are better than any others, they are rich and smooth and not too sweet.But not bitter like the more Dark selection. The packaging details of each being wrapped and twisted adds to the pleasure of my experience. They have a juicy center inside the hard shell that fills my mouth with dark chocolate velvet. I can't make a box last quite a month, but the price is very reasonable for so many little sweeties! 60!! The shipping in summer has been great with the boxes packed in ice bags. All arrived cool and safe! Thanks UPS, FED EX, Too.
customer_reviews.author: dhuma

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: These things made me fat. I got the box during a sale and I told myself that I’d eat one a day to curve my cravings. ITS A TRAP. They’re so good you can’t just eat one, YOU’L EAT THEM ALL. Don’t say I didn’t warn you. If you’re gonna buy them, beware of the chocolate loving monster inside of you that won’t let you stop shoving 10 of them in your mouth all at once.
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: Delightful treat for the chocoholic!  And good for Halloween too!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before. And they were delicious! Yes, I'm a chocoholic! So I bought these and decided to put them in a bowl outside on Halloween for the trick-or-treaters. A perfect choice for Halloween, especially since the package mentions that they have no trace of peanuts, which might otherwise trigger allergic reactions in kids.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRUFFLES !!
customer_reviews.text: These were so good and I shared them with my family. i HAD ORDERED THE CHOCOLATE AND CARAMEL. They arrived in an insulated box with a ice pack. I was so impressed. My only problem is that I am on a limited income and the the price has almost doubled and I can no longer afford these treats, BUT IT WAS WONDERFUL WHILE THEY LASTED. Thanks, GMA
customer_reviews.author: TXGRMA

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery and freshness
customer_reviews.text: I am always shocked at how much care goes into getting these truffles to my door without any melting! They are shipped in a cooler with a cold pack, and even though it can get pretty warm in CO I have never had a problem with melted truffles. The flavor and quality are outstanding - I think they are much more fresh than the truffles you see on display or in the grocery store. I have purchased these several times and I'm sure I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: We ate every single one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Lindt white chocolate truffles during Amazon's early Black Friday sale and got quite a deal. These are white chocolate, which is to say they're not chocolate at all. White chocolate is a confection. The truffles taste great and have a have a sumptuous buttery mouthfeel, but if you have a hankering for the specific taste of chocolate, check out other Lindt choices.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. JSH

customer_reviews.title: SQUISHED
customer_reviews.text: While these are super tasty, almost all of them arrived half smushed/collapsed. Since the box was intact and they were packed well, I guess that there must have been some extreme temperature changes that led to them collapsing. I was going to give these to friends but we will just end up eating them at home instead, since they don't look right for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and delicious.
customer_reviews.text: There was a little ice pack that was inside the Box and so I know the shipper tried to keep everything cool. This was shipped during the summer in the hot part of the summer. As soon as the Box arrived we put it in the refrigerator. Everything was perfect. And delicious it arrived in very good condition and I know the shipper tried very hard to make sure things would not melt. The product was fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Service

customer_reviews.title: Melted mess
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids teachers, but they arrived melted and gooey. Chocolate all over the box. I can't gift these messy chocolates. I thought they'd include a cooler pack since we live in Florida and it's April. The flavor is good and they arrived quickly but they look terrible.
customer_reviews.author: GennardM

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the ingredients prior to purchase. Definitely do not taste like dark chocolate should. When I read the ingredients milk was pretty high up on the list. These do not taste like dark chocolate should.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyjn13

customer_reviews.title: Price is better than you'll get in the store.
customer_reviews.text: Repeat order...these are so popular in our office, I had to buy them again! The price is better than you'll get in any store...in fact this entire box isn't much more than the dinky little bags you get at the drugstore or grocery store...but has a TON more chocolate in it! Added bonus - arrived in the factory retail packaging. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Great candy for a gift
customer_reviews.text: This delicious candy was for a gift for a special person who is having a rough time due to a recent surgery. The candy arrived in perfect condition, in spite of having to sit on a 100° porch for a while until it could be retrieved. The persishable item was packed in ice and styrofoam, so order with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless Goat

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate came melted
customer_reviews.text: Box of chocolates came completely melted. Oil stains all over the box even before opening. We were looking forward to enjoying these. These boxes need to be shipped in cold a cold box with ice packs to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: White chocolate truffles with Cocoa Nibs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a party favor for my daughter's friends. They are her absolute favorite, and as she says, in a word, "Magical!" She has always loved Lindt chocolate, and Lindt white chocolate is one of her faves, so this was an easy choice. This 60ct box was a great deal, given that we couldn't make it to the Lindt outlet any time soon. Wonderfully smooth, rich, satisfying. The flavor fills one's mouth instantly... one of these decadent truffles is really all that is needed. But we all like 2 or 3. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Got these early and I got a great price.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a month but eventually I ate the whole thing. They were sort of hidden in the closet and I never did put them out for guests to eat. It feels good not to be able to resist temptation, but we are suppose to share what we have with others. The caramel I did end up giving to my wife and she gave them away to her family.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: ... it arrived made it entirely the word would be disgusting - they mailed chocolate
customer_reviews.text: The product might have been satisfactory per se - yet the way it arrived made it entirely the word would be disgusting - they mailed chocolate, truffles, to Southern California with temperatures in teh 90s (for that matetr Boston had 90 as well a few days ago) without any attention to the packaging, dry ice, etc. the truffles were melt, whn i opened the pachage an awful liquid, choocolate and filling, came out on a butcher block table - didnt ake teh product very appealing andwill not touch lindt truffles for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Synthesis

customer_reviews.title: Really well packed
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about these after I ordered them because it's been in the mid 90s in my area, and I thought they would arrive all melted. The just got delivered and they were really well packed including having one of those disposible ice packs in the package. I literally opened them on my porch and had one, and it was perfect. It also arrived 3 days earlier than the expected delivery date. Product was fresh and looks perfect. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Most of them were melted and I’m very disappointed as they were intended for some goody bags that I’m making for the holidays. Needless to say I can’t use them, so I put them in the freezer for my partner and I to eat at home.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great taste, and fresh. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Those of us that like the taste and format of Lindt LINDOR milk chocolate truffles, these are a great product. I was able to pick them up on sale, that made them even sweeter!
customer_reviews.author: Hermes Franqui

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product claims it 'ships cold'. well maybe, however that does not mean it arrives cold. These chocolates arrived on my doorstep a melted ball of goo! They went straight from the porch to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in perfect shape!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Linder Milk Chocolate truffles! They were delivered in perfect shape and that is not easy since I live in the South and it is August - one of our hottest monthswould last a while, but everyone that comes in the house has to have “just one” which turns into three or four. I bought them for a family treat and to share with visitors so they were welcome to them. The box only lasted a little over two weeks so I have added them to my subscribe and save order!!! Now we will have them on hand all the time.
customer_reviews.author: NayNay

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Should have put 2 ice packs in the box my chocolate soft I put in refrigerator right away. I seen some chocolate in the corner when I took it out will see what happens 94 outdoor temperature here today day. After putting in refrigerator right away 99 % fine, had some chocolate in the corner inside of the box.
customer_reviews.author: R Benzing

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this big box to use to fill 6 Christmas stockings ...It worked perfect with some leftovers to add to the candy dish...Much cheaper than buying other types of Christmas chocolate and everyone loves them...Probably will do this again next year, maybe they will have the dark chocolate ones....hint, hint....
customer_reviews.author: Susie Fair

customer_reviews.title: They arrived in the cool tote
customer_reviews.text: I like how it melts while eating them. However, it did not contain 60 pieces. Only 58
customer_reviews.author: Lou & T
